Export.Routine:
WWWFORM4 #include COMSYS #define LogR(%1,%2) ; #define LogR2(%1,%2) ; #define LogRx(%1) ; #define LogRm(%1) ; #;define LogR(%1,%2) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))= %1_"^WWWFORM4("_%2_") : "_$zh $$$JournalOn #;define LogR2(%1,%2) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))= %1_"^WWWFORM4("_%2_") : "_$zh $$$JournalOn #;define LogRx(%1) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn #;define LogRm(%1) $$$JournalOff m ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Display Grid Fields ;ANZEIGEN GRIDFELDER ; ; NOTE: Manual fields are not displayed properly ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 27-Jul-2007 shobby SRBR014586: #include COMSYS for $$$Index ; 08-Jun-2007 GRF SR15542: Naked Reference; Expand commands; Doco; quits; ; missed ; 21.08.1997 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YKEY1,YLFN,YA,YI,YDATEI1,YMAXKEY,YMAL,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL,SCHLUESSEL,YFARBCODE,YMAXNUM ;,YSORT,YORIENT $$$LogR("",YFORM) write YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR set YSORT = +$get(%(YQUERY,"YSORT")) set YORIENT = +$get(%(YQUERY,"YORIENT")) set YFOART1 = 3 if YDATEI="" set YDATEI=$piece($get(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,11) quit:YDATEI="" set YMAXKEY=+$order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) if YMAXKEY=0 set YMAXKEY=1 set YGRIKEY=YMAXKEY ; Fill table with blank lines when no entries (?) & quit D144 $$$WWW102DoNotShowEmptyLinesInList() ;--------------------------------------- if YGRIKEY'=1 if YKEY="" do quit . quit:$piece($get(^WWW012(0,0,1)),Y,144)=$$$YES . set YDDSATZ=0 . for YI=1:1:20 do ANZEIGE1 set YDATEI1 = YDATEI ;ZUSAMMENSTELLEN DES FESTEN KEYS (IMMER EINEN WENIGER) set YKEY1 = "" set YA = "^"_YDATEI_"("_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI,0) set YDATA = $get(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)) if $piece(YDATA,Y,12)'="" if $piece(YDATA,Y,13)'="" do ;UCI and VOL . quit:$find(YA,"^[") . set YA = "^["_""""_$piece(YDATA,Y,12)_""""_","_""""_$piece(YDATA,Y,13)_""""_"]"_$piece(YA,"^",2,999) set YA(3)=YA if YKEY'="" for YI=1:1:YMAXKEY quit:$piece(YKEY,",",YI)="" do . quit:YI=YGRIKEY . set YA(99)=$translate($piece(YKEY,",",YI),"""") ;FEHLER IN DATUMSBEARBEITUNG . if $piece($get(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,3)=1 set YA(99)=$$^WWWDATE1(YA(99)) . set YA=YA_","_""""_YA(99)_"""" . set YKEY1=YKEY1_YA(99) . if YI'=(YGRIKEY-1) if $piece(YKEY,",",YI+1)'="" set YKEY1=YKEY1_"," ;VORBEREITEN SUCHFUNKTION ;prepare ;YDATEI = DATEINAME ;file name ;YFKEY = FESTE PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL ;YAUSW = VARIABLE PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL (AB KEY) ODER SORT AB ;Or Confirm. ;YRICHT = 0 UP ; 1 DOWN ;YSORT = SORTIERSCHLÜSSEL ;YANZ = ANZAHL DER GESUCHTEN WERTE ;Number the ;YKOMP = 1 = KOMPLETTER KEY; 2 LETZTER KEY FEHLT(GRID-SUCHE) ;YFIND = SATZ IN FORM YFELD, WENN $F DER SAETZE->DANN STOP ;YFFKY = SATZ IN FORM YKEY, WENN $F DER SAETZE->DANN STOP set YMAXNUM = 2000 if YFORM="WWW009" set YMAXNUM="" ; no limit for language text do ^WWWSOR(YDATEI,YKEY1,"",YORIENT,YSORT,YMAXNUM,1) set YDATA = $get(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)) ;EINZELWERTE ANZEIGEN ;display new YKEY,YDDSATZ set YDDSATZ = 0 set YA(2) = "" for set YA(2) = $order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"KEY",YA(2))) quit:YA(2)="" do . set YKEY="" . for set YKEY = $order(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"KEY",YA(2),YKEY)) quit:YKEY="" do . . ;ZUSAMMENBAUEN DES SCHLÜSSELS . . set YFELD="" . . if YDATEI'="" do . . . set MAXYKEY = +$order(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . . . if MAXYKEY=0 set MAXYKEY=1 . . . set ERSTFELD = $order(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,"")) . . . set FELDKEY = "" . . . if ERSTFELD'="" set FELDKEY = $piece(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,ERSTFELD,1),Y,11) ;FUER MIT ODER OHNE ,1) ZUM SCHLUESSEL . . . if MAXYKEY'=0 do . . . . set Q = 0 . . . . set SCHLUESSEL = "^"_YDATEI_"("_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI,1) . . . . set YDATA = $get(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)) . . . . if $piece(YDATA,Y,12)'="" if $piece(YDATA,Y,13)'="" do ;UCI and VOL . . . . . quit:$find(SCHLUESSEL,"^[") . . . . . set SCHLUESSEL = "^["_""""_$piece(YDATA,Y,12)_""""_","_""""_$piece(YDATA,Y,13)_""""_"]"_$piece(SCHLUESSEL,"^",2,999) . . . . ; . . . . for I=1:1:MAXYKEY set XYKEY=$translate($piece(YKEY,",",I),"""") set SCHLUESSEL=SCHLUESSEL_""""_XYKEY_"""" set:I" } ; SR17119.1 ^^^ write YCR,"" ; Display Last Key as first column ; (WWWFORM3 4a.) ;--------------------------------------- set YLFN = YMAXKEY do . write ""_strSetFont . ;write strBGColour_">"_strSetFont ; SR17119.1 ; SR17243 ^^^ . ; . if ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumReadOnly) && ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumCreateOnly) do . . new YKEY . . write "" . ; . set YINHALT = $piece(YKEY1,",",YLFN) . ; . set YBBN = YLFN . set YINHALT = $$^WWWFORMAT(YDATEI,"P",YLFN,YINHALT) . ; . write $$^WWWUML(YINHALT) . if YINHALT=" " write "[space]" . if $get(YINHALTK)'="" write " ("_$$^WWWUML(YINHALTK)_")" . if ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumReadOnly) && ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumCreateOnly) write "" . ; . write "",YCR ; SR15542 ;--------------------------------------- ; Process form fields in display sequence order (don't include hidden fields) ; (WWWFORM3 4b.) ; ; INDEX 3 : Form / Tab / Row / Column : idForm / idFldNo ;--------------------------------------- set idForm = $$$Index(YFORM) set YSEI = "" for set YSEI = $order(^WWW122s(0,3,idForm,YSEI)) quit:YSEI="" do . set YZEILE = "" . for set YZEILE = $order(^WWW122s(0,3,idForm,YSEI,YZEILE)) quit:YZEILE="" do . . set YSPL = "" . . for set YSPL = $order(^WWW122s(0,3,idForm,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL)) quit:YSPL="" do . . . set YBBN = "" . . . for set YBBN = $order(^WWW122s(0,3,idForm,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL,YFORM,YBBN)) quit:YBBN="" do . . . . quit:$$NoAccess^WWWFORMCOMMON(YFORM,YDATEI,YBBN,.YTXT,.YLFN,"",$get(YOPTION),$get(YOPTION1),$get(YPARA1)) . . . . ; . . . . ; TODO (shobby) YTYP should be obtained from YTXT to take in to account form settings. . . . . ; . . . . $$$LogRx(YFORM_"-"_YBBN_":3:"_$$$WWW122DefaultVariableInput(YTXT)_"<"_YLFN_"<") . . . . ; . . . . if YLFN="" do . . . . . set YTYP = $$$WWW122InputType(YTXT) ;SR17119 . . . . . set YINHALT = $$CalculateString^WWWFORMD($$$WWW122DefaultVariableInput(YTXT),YFORM,YKEY1) ;SR17119 . . . . . set YINHALT = $$DisplayData^COMGridEdit31F1(YINHALT,YFORM,YBBN) ;SR17119 . . . . if YLFN'="" do . . . . . set YINHALT = $piece(YFELD,Y,YLFN) . . . . . set YTYP = $piece($get(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YLFN,1)),Y,3) . . . . ; . . . . $$$LogRx(YFORM_"-"_YBBN_":4:"_YINHALT_"<"_YTYP_"<") . . . . ; . . . . quit:YTYP=0 ; Hidden field . . . . ; . . . . if YTYP=2 if YINHALT="" set YINHALT=0 ;IMMER JA/NEIN ANZEIGEN . . . . set YINHALT = $$^WWWFORMAT(YDATEI,"D",YLFN,YINHALT,3) ;Return colour as well for WWW101/INPARA . . . . ; . . . . $$$LogRx(YFORM_"-"_YBBN_":5:"_YINHALT_"<"_YTYP_"<"_YLFN_"<") . . . . ; . . . . set YFARBCODE = $piece(YINHALT,Y,2) . . . . set YINHALT = $piece(YINHALT,Y,1) . . . . if YINHALT="" set YINHALT = " " . . . . ; . . . . write ""_strSetFont ; SR17119.1 . . . . ; . . . . if ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumReadOnly) && ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumCreateOnly) do . . . . . new YKEY . . . . . write "" . . . . ; . . . . write $$^WWWUML(YINHALT) . . . . if YINHALT'="" if $find(YINHALT,".GIF") || ($find(YINHALT,".gif")) || ($find(YINHALT,".JPG")) || ($find(YINHALT,".jpg")) do THUMP . . . . if ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumReadOnly) && ($$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)'=$$$EnumCreateOnly) write "" . . . . ; . . . . write "",YCR ; SR15542 write "",YCR kill ^CacheTempWWWFORM4(YUSER,"OnBeforeFormat") ; SR17243 quit ANZEIGE1 ;LEERFELDER ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 26-Feb-2010 GRF SR17119.1: use strBGColour & strSetFont to improve ; performance ; 11-Feb-2009 GRF SR16347: Manual Form Field won't have Class link - ; subscript error on YLFN ; 27-Jul-2007 shobby SRBR014615: Removed YHIDDSE as a parameter to NoAccess ; 27-Jul-2007 shobby SRBR014586: Include YOPTION, YOPTION1, YPARA1 in the 'access' test. ; 19-Jul-2007 shobby SRBR014615: Subroutined NoAccess call to make sure all ; customisations are considered ; 28-Oct-2005 JW SR13074: Exchange Rate type ; 9-Sep-2005 JW Only call WWWUMLAU once (idxForm) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idxForm,strBGColour,strSetFont set YDDSATZ = YDDSATZ+1 set strBGColour = " BGCOLOR="_$select(YDDSATZ#2:YWHITE,1:YGRAY) ;SR17119.1 vvv if $piece(YVOR,Y,7)="" { set strSetFont = "" } else { set strSetFont = "" } ;SR17119.1 ^^^ write YCR,"" set YLFN=YMAXKEY do . write ""_strSetFont ; SR17119.1 . write " " . write "",YCR ; SR15542 set idxForm = $$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1) set YSEI="" for set YSEI=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,idxForm,YSEI)) quit:YSEI="" do . set YZEILE="" . for set YZEILE=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,idxForm,YSEI,YZEILE)) quit:YZEILE="" do . . set YSPL="" . . for set YSPL=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,idxForm,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL)) quit:YSPL="" do . . . set YBBN="" . . . for set YBBN=$order(^WWW122s(0,3,idxForm,YSEI,YZEILE,YSPL,YFORM,YBBN)) quit:YBBN="" do . . . . quit:$$NoAccess^WWWFORMCOMMON(YFORM,YDATEI,YBBN,.YTXT,.YLFN,"",$get(YOPTION),$get(YOPTION1),$get(YPARA1)) . . . . ; . . . . write ""_strSetFont ; SR17119.1 . . . . write " " . . . . write "",YCR ; SR15542 write "",YCR quit THUMP ;BILDER ANZEIGEN UND ANDER OBJEKTE ; display images new YWIDTH1,YHEIHT1,YBORDER,YI quit:YINHALT="" quit:$find(YINHALT,"|") quit:$find(YINHALT," ") set YWIDTH1=100 set YHEIHT1=100 set YBORDER=1 for YI=53:1:56 set YO(YI)=$piece(YVOR,Y,YI) for YI=53:1:56 if '$data(YO(YI)) set YO(YI)="" if YO(53)=1 quit ;KEIN OBJEKT ;no thing if +YO(54)'=0 set YWIDTH1=YO(54) if +YO(55)'=0 set YHEIHT1=YO(55) if +YO(56)'=0 set YBORDER=0 if $find(YINHALT,".GIF") || $find(YINHALT,".gif") || $find(YINHALT,".jpg") || $find(YINHALT,".JPG") do quit . if '$find(YINHALT,"/") set YINHALT=YGIF_YINHALT . write " " . write YCR,"" if $find(YINHALT,".AVI") || $find(YINHALT,".avi") do quit . if '$find(YINHALT,"/") set YINHALT=YGIF_YINHALT . write " " . write "
" if $length(YINHALT,".")=2 if $extract(YINHALT,$length(YINHALT)-3)="." do quit . if '$find(YINHALT,"/") set YINHALT=YGIF_YINHALT . write "" quit OnBeforeFormat(YFORM,YKEY,YFELD,YART,YLFN,&pstrBGOverride) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Duplicate Form Type 12 : Edit Grid "OnBeforeFormat" processing for ; Form Type 3 : Grid forms - only when there is an "OnBeforeFormat" tag in the ; routine matching the form name ; ; Will use ^CacheTempWWWFORM4(YUSER,"OnBeforeFormat") as temporary storage ; where all records need to be reviewed first. ; ; Params: YFORM, YKEY, YFELD ; - isolated to preserve values in calling routine ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: Nothing ; ; History: ; 10-Nov-2010 GRF SR17243: created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $$$LogR2("OnBeforeFormat",YKEY_"<"_YFELD_"<"_YART_"<"_YLFN) do CallEvent^COMGridEdit31Events("do OnBeforeFormat^"_YFORM_"(YKEY,YFELD,YART,YLFN,.pstrBGOverride)","Format") ; *** EXECUTE *** $$$LogRx("OBF1:"_$get(pstrBGOverride)_"<"_$get(YTOOLTIP)) quit
